text: If I could get any new Mario sports game, a sequel to this game would be my choice. I remember first playing this game at a gaming expo here in Montreal months before its release, and I had so much fun I had to buy it Day 1. Many fun nights with friends were had. The music was also excellent with its smooth and clean sound, its style really stood out from other Mario games.

author: Christopher Foss

text: The first Mario Strikers was awesome. I remember playing it for hours on end at a gaming get-together for about 100 people. When Charged was released, I already had it on pre-order...only to play it just for 30 minutes. It just feels completely off compared to the first one, especially the charged mechanic. This was in fact the last time I ever preordered a game. Yes, this game made me stop preordering entirely.
